text: Spoons is a Canadian new wave band, formed in Burlington, Ontario in 1976. They recorded several Canadian chart hits between 1979 and 1986, and in 1980, they were nominated for Most Promising Group of the Year at the Juno Awards. Their most popular songs include "Romantic Traffic", "Nova Heart", "Old Emotions", and "Tell No Lies". title: Spoons (band)
